Program Overview

Product Design Foundation: Igniting Creative Prowess

Our Product Design Foundation program is your gateway to the exciting realm of product design. Tailored for early professionals with a passion for design, this program delivers a foundational understanding of the art and science of product design. Through a condensed yet comprehensive curriculum, you’ll embark on a transformative journey, honing your design skills, mastering user-centric thinking, and acquiring the proficiency to craft captivating user experiences.

By the program’s end, you’ll possess a solid grasp of product design essentials, empowering you to wield design tools, employ user-centric methodologies, and launch your own design projects. This program fuels your creativity and equips you with the skills to make a lasting impact in the dynamic world of design.

  • Product Knowledge

  • Core Design Principles

  • Design Thinking

  • User Centric Thinking

  • Creativity and Innovation

  • Product Prototyping

  • Industry Insights

  • Critical Thinking

  • Portfolio Development

  • Proficiency in design tools

  • Relevant Softskills

  • Project Execution

How You Will Learn

Methods: Virtual and Physical classes, Business case-studies, Virtual projects, and Interactive quizzes.

Virtual Classes

Our virtual classes are led by industry experts who have years of experience in product management. Through our virtual classes, you will have the opportunity to interact with experienced product management professionals and gain a deep understanding of the latest industry tools and techniques. You will also be able to connect with other aspiring product managers, share experiences and learn from each other.

Hands-On Projects

Apply your learning through hands-on projects, tackling design challenges, and building a professional design portfolio.

Peer Collaboration

Collaborate with fellow learners, sharing ideas, providing feedback, and working together on team projects.

Expert Guidance

Benefit from the wisdom of experienced design instructors who offer mentorship, guidance, and insights.

Real-World Scenarios

Solve practical design problems, simulating real-world scenarios to enhance your problem-solving skills.

Continuous Evaluation

Receive feedback on your work, ensuring your progress and development throughout the program.

What You Will Learn

You will journey through 7 intensive modules into becoming a digital marketing professional capable of building and executing digital marketing strategies.

Here’s what you will learn:

  • Module 1
  • Module 2
  • Module 3
  • Module 4
  • Module 5
  • Module 6
  • Module 7
  • Module 8
Edit Content

Introduction to Product Design

Gain a deep understanding of the fundamental principles that underpin product design.

Explore the historical evolution of design and its significance in various industries.

Develop a solid foundation in product design theory and practice.

Edit Content

User-Centric Design Approach

Master the art of user-centric design thinking, a critical skill for any product designer.

Learn how to empathize with users, identify their needs, and create designs that resonate with them.

Apply the principles of design thinking to develop user-centric products and solutions.

Edit Content

Proficiency in Design Tools

Familiarize yourself with essential design software and tools used in the industry.

Gain hands-on experience in using these tools, acquiring practical design skills.

Create your own design projects, applying your newly acquired design software proficiency.

Edit Content

From Concept to Creation

Dive into the complete product design process, starting with idea generation and ending with the final product.

Develop skills in defining clear design objectives, project planning, and creating comprehensive design briefs.

Gain practical experience by taking design projects from concept to fully realized products.

Edit Content

Design Project Management

Acquire project management skills tailored to the field of design.

Learn to manage project timelines, allocate resources, and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

Enhance your ability to communicate design concepts and ideas to a wide range of stakeholders.

Edit Content

Crafting a Professional Design Portfolio

Create a compelling design portfolio that showcases your skills and highlights your design projects.

Learn effective presentation techniques to demonstrate your design capabilities to potential employers or clients.

Gain insights into industry best practices for creating an impressive design portfolio.

Edit Content

Staying Ahead in Design Trends

Explore the latest design trends and innovations, including sustainability, UX design, and emerging technologies.

Develop strategies for staying updated with industry developments and implementing innovative concepts in your design projects.

Edit Content

Igniting Creative Solutions

Cultivate your creative spirit and discover techniques for generating innovative design ideas.

Apply creative problem-solving approaches to address design challenges effectively.

Learn how to transform creative concepts into practical and user-centered design solutions.

Class Requirements

  • 4-8 weeks, 11-12 hours/week

  • Access to a laptop or desktop computer with a minimum of 4gig ram, and 256g SSD or 500g HDD Rom.

  • Access to a stable internet connection

  • Proficiency in written and spoken English

Testimonials

My job was one of the things that took a hit during the pandemic. I was devastated by this but a respected senior friend convinced me to go and improve my skills at PDMA so I'd be indispensable. He wasn't wrong. In 4 short weeks, the improvement was so obvious and profound that Lagos Business School approached me. In a very short while, using what I learned at PDMA, I did not just land a job, I rose to Manager ranks at Lagos Business School. Looking back, I am glad the last job ended...but I am most glad I went to PDMA.
Toba OlugosiClient Relationship Manager, Lagos Business School
After graduating from University, I knew needed digital skills if this economy was going to favor me. It didn’t take long to find PDMA, and I am glad I did. My experience at PDMA positioned me to land a job right after my graduation where I manage local international brands…it didn’t even take time to happen. I am really happy cos truly when you weigh it against the value you get, PDMA is just doing giveaways to help people like me get their lives started. PDMA Should Charge More
Ifeoluwa IsraelContent Writer
I AM DOING WELL! I loved marketing, the only problem was I didn't know how to do it. I knew I had to start from somewhere and I am glad I started from PDMA. PDMA started from the basics of marketing before we went into digital marketing and that was my eureka moment. I would have just known the tools and been totally clueless about converting customers. Today, I am the lead strategist for several multination brands and I can't even lie, PDMA laid the foundation for this career I am enjoying today.
Benjamin IkadeCreative Strategist, Xpark360
